content.rendered:
Guides for AwesomeAdmins

When I was first entering the world of Salesforce development, the only education I had for development was in HTML.  So when I went to find out how to install and setup the Force.com IDE, MavensMate, Eclipse, I was totally freakin’ lost.  I had no idea what I was supposed to be doing and whether or not I had set things up right.  Everything I found was written for people that already knew what they were doing, and I had no idea what to do.

That’s why I have created the following install and setup guides for the Force.com IDE, MavensMate, and the Haoide (my personal favorite).  In addition, I will be adding how-to guides for each app geared towards #awesomeadmin, with step by step instructions, and without the assumption that the information is just known.

If my instructions are unclear, or you have questions, please let me know.  Like I said, I am writing these for admins and others without a development background, to help, not to cause frustration, so if something needs to be modified, let me know.  

Install & Setup Guides



How to Install the Force.com IDE

Use the directions below to learn how to install and setup the Force.com IDE. Written for #AwesomeAdmin.

Read More



How to Install MavensMate

Use the directions below to learn how to install and setup MavensMate. Once you follow the steps below you will be up and running! Written with #AwesomeAdmin in mind!

Read More



How to Install the HaoIDE

Use the directions below to learn how to install and setup the Haoide. Once you follow the steps below you will be up and running!

Read More

How To Guides



Find Your Instance With A Custom Domain

When you have a custom domain, it isn’t obvious what you Salesforce instance is. Here is how you can lookup your instance with your custom domain.

Read More



CMS Connect for WordPress

So you want to connect your WordPress site to your Salesforce Community? Here’s how it’s done, declaratively, with CMS Connect.

Read More



Backing Up Your Org

How to backup your org’s data and metadata, and what to do when a crazy-random-happenstance happens, like data loss.

Read More



Field Breakups

Are you two just not working out? Has he been lying to you with bad data? Or have you just outgrown each other? No matter what the reason, things have to end. It’s ok, not all fields are meant to be in Salesforce forever. Don’t rip that bandaid just yet through, these things take time.

Read More

excerpt.rendered: Install, setup, and how-to guides written for #awesomeadmin for the Force.com IDE, MavensMate, and the Haoide.

jetpack-related-posts.title: My Top Salesforce Books
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Must have books in your collection as an Architect on the Force.com Platform. Major Props to the Authors - Tameem Bahri, James Hutcherson, Ahsan Zafa, Mike King, Andy Fawcett and by Eric Freeman & Elisabeth Robson for creating my top 5. https://www.amazon.com/Becoming-Salesforce-Certified-Technical-Architect-ebook/dp/B08NXV3H15/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-1 https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Data-Architecture-Management-effectively/dp/1801073244/ref=sr_1_3_sspa?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-3-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzRDY0Mk9SWENLSE1GJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMzU1ODU1WEY4MzlYSTRaVVhPJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAyMzg4NzQxRUxTTUFUVk1VREZPJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Architects-Handbook-End-End-ebook/dp/B08TLJYTSZ/ref=sr_1_2_sspa?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-2-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzRDY0Mk9SWENLSE1GJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMzU1ODU1WEY4MzlYSTRaVVhPJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAwMTU1MTYzNVNYRENONDJUM0lDJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Solution-Architects-business-consumer-ebook/dp/B09BZY4G4B/ref=sr_1_8?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-8 https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Lightning-Platform-Enterprise-Architecture-ebook/dp/B07SYJBV7P/ref=sr_1_7?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-7 https://www.amazon.com/dp/149207800X/ref=redir_mobile_desktop?_encoding=UTF8&aaxitk=68b51899314bf7e95d9c6163e5917f86&hsa_cr_id=3731486690201&pd_rd_plhdr=t&pd_rd_r=074aec07-6e18-4ad6-8573-aade53769f14&pd_rd_w=ncCU5&pd_rd_wg=bnsNa&ref_=sbx_be_s_sparkle_mcd_asin_0_img
